title: RIOT PLEASE RESPOND.
body: ok riot i was in a intro bots game playing and after the game i got 5 20 min ban to wait after eatch game for being AFK i wasnt even afk? riot please explain to me i dont wanna wait 20 mins before game for something i didnt even do

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Toxicfury666,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=zAX69BkN,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-10-18T10:22:10.295+0000)
>
> ok riot i was in a intro bots game playing and after the game i got 5 20 min ban to wait after eatch game for being AFK i wasnt even afk? riot please explain to me i dont wanna wait 20 mins before game for something i didnt even do

im so pissed off riot please fix this

You won't be taken out of the queue, but [send in a support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to Riot and ask which game triggered it. Sorry, but we can't help you anymore on the boards as this is an account specific enquiry. 

Be patient when sending in a ticket, it may take up to a week to get a reply (very busy end of season). In this time, please do not create multiple tickets or try adding information to "bump" your ticket as it will actually increase the wait time. GL!
You can get leaver buster simply for being AFK for ten or more minutes, otherwise you should probably ask support, they might remove it or give you some compensation.
ok man thank u was just confused on why i got the ban i did the time for it because i wanted to play was just confused on why i got it since i wasnt afk dude :) cheers

[CAN YOU TAKE ME OUT OF LOW PRIORITY QUEUE?](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ#h2q6)
No. We will not take your account out of low priority queue under any circumstances.
